forgot.title: Forgot Password
forgot.prompt: Enter the email address you registered with to receive a reset password link.
forgot.success: Please check your email in a few moments for a password reset link.

reset.title: Reset Password
reset.prompt: New password must be between 8 and 30 characters. Must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one symbol.
reset.expired: Sorry, this password reset link has expired.
reset.invalid: The password reset link you used is invalid.
reset.success: Your new password has been saved!
